A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The haters should re-watch the original movies\, especially Return of the Jedi. This is a better film\, while doing many of the same things\, but better. The plotting in the middle\, with Finn and with Poe is not incredible\, but  Jabba's palace... The asteroid chase and hiding in the Space Slug.. They were the most important to the overall plot either. I loved Luke in this\, a human\, a Jedi\, and a true Master.  Like\, watch Justice League and then this.. no comparison and no bad CGI lips!
